patthana15.54:1.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.54:2.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.54:3.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
